SELECT U.USERNAME,HANDPHONE,LOGINPWD,TRADINGPWD,O.AUTHTYPE,U.STATUS,LOGINSTATUS,LASTCHANGED,NUMBEROFDAY,LASTLOGIN, CASE WHEN u.expdate <= getcurrdate THEN 'Y' ELSE u.isreset END ISRESET, ISMASTER,TOKENID,U.EXPDATE, CF.CUSTID,CF.FULLNAME,CF.CUSTODYCD,CF.EMAIL, CF.ISBANKING, CF.CUSTATCOM ISLOCAL, TOKENID , CF.SEX FROM USERLOGIN U,CFMAST CF, OTRIGHT o WHERE U.USERNAME=CF.USERNAME /*AND CF.STATUS='A'*/ AND U.STATUS = 'A' AND O.Cfcustid = O.Authcustid AND o.authcustid = cf.custid and o.deltd ='N' and o.via ='A' AND U.USERNAME=UPPER(:SUSERNAME) AND U.LOGINPWD=LOWER(:SPASSWORD)

SELECT U.USERNAME,HANDPHONE,LOGINPWD,TRADINGPWD,O.AUTHTYPE,U.STATUS,LOGINSTATUS,LASTCHANGED,NUMBEROFDAY,LASTLOGIN, CASE WHEN u.expdate <= getcurrdate THEN 'Y' ELSE u.isreset END ISRESET, ISMASTER,U.EXPDATE, CF.CUSTID,CF.FULLNAME,CF.CUSTODYCD,CF.EMAIL, CF.ISBANKING, CF.CUSTATCOM ISLOCAL, '{MSBS{SMS{'||substr( u.TOKENID, instr(u.TOKENID,'{',1, 3) +1 , instr(u.TOKENID,'}',1) - instr(u.TOKENID,'{',1, 3) - 1) ||'},EMAIL{' ||cf.email || '}}}' TOKENID, CF.STATUS CFMASTSTATUS, U.STATUS USERLOGINSTATUS, CF.SEX FROM USERLOGIN U,CFMAST CF, OTRIGHT o WHERE U.USERNAME=CF.USERNAME AND O.Cfcustid = O.Authcustid AND o.authcustid = cf.custid and o.deltd ='N' and o.via ='A' AND U.USERNAME=UPPER(:SUSERNAME) AND U.LOGINPWD=LOWER(:SPASSWORD)

SELECT U.USERNAME, U.Authtype, u.status, u.isreset, u.ismaster ,CF.CUSTID,CF.FULLNAME,CF.CUSTODYCD,CF.EMAIL, CF.ISBANKING, CF.CUSTATCOM ISLOCAL, CF.STATUS CFMASTSTATUS, U.STATUS USERLOGINSTATUS, '{MSBS{SMS{'||substr( u.TOKENID, instr(u.TOKENID,'{',1, 3) +1 , instr(u.TOKENID,'}',1) - instr(u.TOKENID,'{',1, 3) - 1) ||'},EMAIL{' ||cf.email || '}}}' TOKENID, CF.SEX FROM SHAUSERLOGIN SHAU,CFMAST CF, USERLOGIN U WHERE SHAU.USERNAME=U.USERNAME AND U.USERNAME=CF.USERNAME AND U.USERNAME=UPPER(:SUSERNAME)

SELECT U.USERNAME,HANDPHONE,LOGINPWD,TRADINGPWD,AUTHTYPE,U.STATUS,LOGINSTATUS,LASTCHANGED,NUMBEROFDAY,LASTLOGIN, CASE WHEN u.expdate <= getcurrdate THEN 'Y' ELSE u.isreset END ISRESET, ISMASTER,U.EXPDATE, CF.CUSTID,CF.FULLNAME,CF.CUSTODYCD,CF.EMAIL, CF.ISBANKING, CF.CUSTATCOM ISLOCAL, '{MSBS{SMS{'||substr( u.TOKENID, instr(u.TOKENID,'{',1, 3) +1 , instr(u.TOKENID,'}',1) - instr(u.TOKENID,'{',1, 3) - 1) ||'},EMAIL{' ||cf.email || '}}}' TOKENID, CF.STATUS CFMASTSTATUS, U.STATUS USERLOGINSTATUS, CF.SEX FROM USERLOGIN U,CFMAST CF WHERE U.USERNAME=CF.USERNAME AND U.USERNAME=UPPER(:SUSERNAME)

SELECT 1 OWNER,AF.ACCTNO,AF.Fax1,AF.Email,CF.CUSTODYCD,AF.CUSTID,CF.FULLNAME,'YYYYYYYYYY' LINKAUTH,AF.BANKACCTNO, AF.BANKNAME,CI.COREBANK,AF.STATUS,'' TYPENAME, AFT.TYPENAME AFTYPE, (CASE WHEN R.EXPDATE < TO_DATE(:TXDATE, 'DD/MM/RRRR') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) EXPIRED, AF.TRADEONLINE, R.SERIALNUMSIG SERIAL, R.AUTHTYPE FROM OTRIGHT R, AFMAST AF,CFMAST CF,CIMAST CI, AFTYPE AFT WHERE AF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND AF.ACCTNO=CI.AFACCTNO AND AF.ACTYPE=AFT.ACTYPE AND R.CFCUSTID = R.AUTHCUSTID AND R.CFCUSTID = CF.CUSTID AND R.DELTD = 'N' AND R.VIA = 'A' AND R.AUTHCUSTID=:SCUSTID --AND AF.TRADEONLINE = 'Y' --AND TO_DATE(:TXDATE, 'DD/MM/RRRR') <= R.EXPDATE UNION ALL SELECT 0 OWNER,AF.ACCTNO,AF.Fax1,AF.Email,CF.CUSTODYCD,CF.CUSTID,CF.FULLNAME,'NNNNNNNNNN' LINKAUTH,AF.BANKACCTNO, AF.BANKNAME,CI.COREBANK,AF.STATUS, '' TYPENAME, AFT.TYPENAME AFTYPE, (CASE WHEN R.EXPDATE < TO_DATE(:TXDATE, 'DD/MM/RRRR') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) EXPIRED, AF.TRADEONLINE, R.SERIALNUMSIG SERIAL,R.AUTHTYPE FROM OTRIGHT R, AFMAST AF, CFMAST CF, CIMAST CI, AFTYPE AFT WHERE AF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND AF.ACCTNO=CI.AFACCTNO AND AF.ACTYPE=AFT.ACTYPE AND R.CFCUSTID <> R.AUTHCUSTID AND R.CFCUSTID = CF.CUSTID AND R.VIA = 'A' AND R.DELTD = 'N' AND R.AUTHCUSTID = :SCUSTID --AND AF.TRADEONLINE = 'Y' --AND TO_DATE(:TXDATE, 'DD/MM/RRRR') <= R.EXPDATE ORDER BY OWNER DESC
